title: Battery Indicator Pro v6.0.3 Final By bobiras2009
description:
By bobiras2009	
		

If you appreciate my work you can leave a commnent and seed this for as long you can to help me upload more.


Requirements: 4.0+
Overview: Battery Indicator Pro shows your battery charge level (percent) as an icon in your status bar, with temperature, health, voltage, and time since plugged / unplugged in the notification area. Now has an alarm feature.

Features:
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Fully configurable green, amber, red, and black icons
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Estimated charge / discharge time left
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Battery logging. You can log the battery state (charge, status, voltage, temperature) and browse the logs on the phone or export to CSV.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Manually or automatically disable / reenable device lock screen / lockscreen / keyguard
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Alarms (full, charge above X, charge below X, temperature above X, or health failure)
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Themes for main window
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Lots of configurability; most features are optional
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Very lightweight (please email me if you think otherwise, and I'll help you figure out what's wrong Ã¢â‚¬â€ I promise this app will not drain your battery.)
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Open source

Limitations:
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Motorola Droids and Samsung Moment only show every 10%
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ It's not possible to replace the built-in battery icon

* Please see the project website (linked to below) to contact me if you have any questions or problems Ã¢â‚¬â€ I can't respond to comments left here. *

What's in this version:
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Shows separate notification when the lock screen is being disabled by the app. (This can be turned off if desired.)
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Users of Jelly Bean (Android 4.1+) can set the notification priority. See full changelog for details. (Defaults to "low" priority to stay out of the way.)
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Now only displays the voltage if the reported voltage is realistic. Some devices (e.g. Nexus 7) report an invalid voltage that is no longer displayed.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Made the main window action bar a brighter, more noticeable grey.

                                    By bobiras2009
